channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Connect & Oracle OpenWorld 2012
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-connect-oracle-openworld-2012/index.html#comment-595">Eric</a>.
Hi Eric,
Nothing on the immediate horizon to go beyond the existing situation of being able to store everything apart from indexed columns on disk.
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eric.

Hi Eric,

Nothing on the immediate horizon to go beyond the existing situation of being able to store everything apart from indexed columns on disk.

Andrew.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
Heya Andrew,
Thanks for all the information you give us. Have you heard any rumblings about when MySQL Cluster might support 100% disk data?
item.content:encoded:
Heya Andrew,

Thanks for all the information you give us. Have you heard any rumblings about when MySQL Cluster might support 100% disk data?
